description: Netools provides tools to deal with devices, TCP and UDP clients/servers, etc.
name: netools

0.2.releaseNotes:
Bugfixes:
 - netools_device::get_mask no longer segfaults ;)
 - netools_device functions now return NULL if they can't find the propertyinstead of raising an E_WARNING and returning false
 - fixed a potential buffer overflow in netools_device constructor
New features:
 - netools_device_enum - a function that returns all available devices (in next version (i hope :) it will be possible to add filters)
